H0.text: Which European capital city is located 40 miles east of Vienna. Bratislava

H1.text: Which European capital city is located 40 miles east of Vienna. Budapest

H2.text: Which European capital city is located 40 miles east of Vienna. Ljubljana

H3.text: Which European capital city is located 40 miles east of Vienna. Požun

A4.text: making them the closest pair of capital cities in Europe at just 50 kilometres (31 mi) apart.

A5.text: It is only 60 kilometres (37.3 mi) from the Austrian capital Vienna.

A6.text: Vienna lies around 50 km (31 mi) west of Slovakia and its capital Bratislava

A7.text: Bratislava is the capital and largest city of Slovakia.

A8.text: The city is situated on the border of three countries—Slovakia, Austria, and Hungary—and is the only national capital to have land borders with two other sovereign states.
